channel.title: Devolution Specials
channel.description: I ahve devolution specials added but now i can keep clicking the spec and it keeps specing, the coler bar doesnt lower either, any help?

item.title: Devolution Specials
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

ya, search in client.java for the id of the staff… and when u find it, most likely around something that says ancients remove the id it will say something like check for item “id” and delete that.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Specials
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

ok and i have another question…i want to disable needing an anchient staff to use anchient spells any way?

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Specials
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

im sorry, but really i dont ever have the problems wit it… and i dont use specials on my server since i disabled them becuz they cause alot of problems lol… but ya i hope u can figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Specials
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

well i wish i could get a better way of help but rep++

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Specials
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

i have dodian servers… and well i never really had that problem but u can search threw ur client.java and find where it says something about specials… and change it from true to false… that way it will be set on a timer… or change ur special sets so it has a timer to wait… such as like 60 secs… so it wont let them special for that long when the special reachs 0. but u will have to search threw other codes to find the timer… cuz i foregot wat it looks like

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Specials
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:6, topic:221620”]umm… ok first off… y didnt u just put for like when it is 0… remove the words special attack… and so on… remove the letters per ea %… becuz i cant find the place to put the boolean.[/quote]well if you do devolution can you make me a quick tut on what to add? ill rep++

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Specials
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

umm… ok first off… y didnt u just put for like when it is 0… remove the words special attack… and so on… remove the letters per ea %… becuz i cant find the place to put the boolean.

Read full topic

[code]public void specialAttacks3(int ID) {
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];

    if (c.specialAmount >= 0 && c.specialAmount <= 24) {

        c.sendFrame126("@yel@S P E C I A L  A T T A @bla@C K", 7561);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7551);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7552);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7553);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7554);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7555);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7556);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7557);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7558);
        c.fsBar(0, 0, 7559);
        c.fsBar(0, 0, 7560);
    }
    if (c.specialAmount >= 100 && c.usingSpecial == true) {
        c.sendFrame126("@yel@S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7561);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7551);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7552);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7553);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7554);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7555);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7556);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7557);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7558);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7559);
        c.fsBar(500, 0, 7560);
    }
}[/code]
